step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Good job raising your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them toward your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent hold! You maintained good form throughout the 30 seconds.
Smooth reversal. You returned to the starting position effectively.
Second rep starting strong! Hands clasped well in your lap.
Good movement. Focus on keeping those elbows a bit closer as you lift your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep that head tall and avoid any forward pull.
Great hold! You maintained good posture and elbow position.
Perfect return to the start. You completed the exercise smoothly.

exercise_summary: You did a fantastic job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward for best results.
